Method Detail

getExpression

public abstract Expression getExpression()
Get a Expression. May do caching.

Returns:

getOutputType

public abstract RGLType getOutputType()
Get the output type for the processor. For some processor functions, the output type will depend on the input types. Therefor the result may depend on the processor inputs. If a processor is not well-typed, this method returns null.

Returns:
the output type.

resetCachedExpression

public abstract void resetCachedExpression()
